sql: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION get_pool_owners(_pool_bech32 text)
RETURNS JSON STABLE LANGUAGE PLPGSQL AS $$
RETURN ( SELECT json_agg(js) json_final FROM ( SELECT json_build_object(
LEFT JOIN stake_address AS sa ON sa.id = po.addr_id
LEFT JOIN tx_out as tout ON tout.tx_id = po.registered_tx_id
WHERE po.pool_hash_id = (SELECT id from pool_hash where view=_pool_bech32)
